name: Out There (rbatistadelima)
description:
You maybe have to play it twice, but each playthrough should take 2 minutes or less. If the tip at the end does not apply to you, you don't have to play it again.

Do not interact with the blue picture, the one depicting the inside of the cabin. Unless you're thirsty.

In the fullscreen mode it can hide a link and there's no page scrolling. Press ESC to exit the fullscreen. If it's too small, please zoom the whole page (focus on the page clicking outside the game and press CRTL and +. Press CTRL and - to zoom out and CTRL and 0 to reset the view)
